price: 10. Dan sama saja bagi mereka, apakah engkau memberi peringatan kepada mereka atau engkau tidak memberi peringatan kepada mereka, mereka tidak akan beriman juga.
arabic: وَسَوَآءٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ ءَأَنذَرۡتَهُمۡ أَمۡ لَمۡ تُنذِرۡهُمۡ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wasawāon ʿalayhim a-andhartahum am lam tundhir'hum lā yu'minūna
